name: Farvest
tag_list: it, finance, green, human-resources, automotive, marketing, communication, events
overview:
Farvest is the leading B2B marketing agency in Luxembourg. It is a leader in targeted digital media and it organizes the greatest national events.

Its values? Innovation, reliability, expertise, pragmatism and humanity.

Founded in June 2000, Farvest’s objective is to put in relation the need with the offer, end-users and consultants. It is based on 6 main communities:

  • HR One
  • IT One
  • CFO World
  • Marketers
  • Greenworks
  • Automotion

Each community gathers stakeholders from the sector they are working for. They inform about trends and issues at a national and international scale and organize events regarding the area they are dedicated to.

Farvest surfs on current trends and promote efforts of inventiveness and entrepreneurship.
